Annotations.content: This needs to be done because a user-defined value for the Set Working Queue block type doesn't seem to work?
Validation here is "nice to have", so we'll still continue with the payment if something fails.
Validation here is "nice to have", so we'll still continue with the payment if something fails.
Validation here is "nice to have", so we'll still continue with the payment if something fails.
Validation here is "nice to have", so we'll still continue with the payment if something fails.

Metadata.name: C3 Payment IVR Flow Module
Metadata.description: Flow module to collect payments through a self-service IVR using C3.

Parameters.Text:
<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
There was an error creating the payment request.
</prosody>
</speak>

<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
A payment has been requested for the amount of $$.Attributes.PaymentAmountDue.
</prosody>
</speak>

<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
Are you still there?
</prosody>
</speak>

<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
The entered amount of $$.StoredCustomerInput exceeds the total amount due of $$.Attributes.PaymentAmountDue. Please try again with a smaller amount.
</prosody>
</speak>

<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
The entered amount of $$.StoredCustomerInput is less than the minimum payment of $$.Attributes.PaymentMinimumPayment. Please try again with a larger amount.
</prosody>
</speak>

<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
Are you still there?
</prosody>
</speak>

<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
Your entry was not recognized. Please try again.
</prosody>
</speak>

Transitions.NextAction: Set Payment Amount to Entered Amount

</prosody>
</speak>

<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
You are permitted to make a partial payment of at least $$.Attributes.PaymentMinimumPayment.
</prosody>
</speak>

<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
To pay the amount in full, press 1.
To pay a partial amount, press 2.
</prosody>
</speak>

Conditions.NextAction: Set Payment Amount to Full Amount

<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
There was a problem with your bank routing number. Please check your entry and try again.
</prosody>
</speak>

<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
Are you still there?
</prosody>
</speak>

<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
There was a problem with your expiration date. Please check your entry and try again.
</prosody>
</speak>

<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
Please enter your card's expiration date in the format month-month-year-year, followed by the pound key when complete.
</prosody>
</speak>

<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
Are you still there?
</prosody>
</speak>

<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
Your entry was not recognized. Please try again.
</prosody>
</speak>

<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
To transfer to a representative and receive a receipt for your payment, press 1.
To continue without a receipt, press 2.
</prosody>
</speak>

<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
A receipt has been sent to your email address, $.Attributes.['Email'].
</prosody>
</speak>

<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
There was an error sending the receipt to your email address, $.Attributes.['Email']. Please contact customer support to receive a receipt for this transaction.
</prosody>
</speak>

<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
An error prevented us from connecting you to a representative. Please try calling the customer service number directly in order to receive a receipt.
</prosody>
</speak>

<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
$.External.ValidationError

Please check your entry and try again.
</prosody>
</speak>

</prosody>

Your payment was processed successfully.

Parameters.Text:
<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
The payment failed to submit because of the following error:

$.External.Error

You have not been charged.
</prosody>
</speak>

Parameters.Text:
<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
You previously paid with a credit or debit card ending in <say-as interpret-as="digits">$.Attributes.PaymentMethodEndingDigits</say-as>.

If you would like to use this card again for this payment, press 1.
To use a different payment method, press 2.
</prosody>
</speak>

<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
You previously paid with a bank account ending in <say-as interpret-as="digits">$.Attributes.PaymentMethodEndingDigits</say-as>.

If you would like to use this account again for this payment, press 1.
To use a different payment method, press 2.
</prosody>
</speak>

<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
To pay with a credit or debit card, press 1.
To pay directly with your bank account, press 2.
</prosody>
</speak>

<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
Please enter your card number followed by the pound key when complete.
</prosody>
</speak>

Actions.Identifier: Remove Failed Payment Token and Method

Parameters.Text:
<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
We’re unable to confirm if your payment was processed. Please check your $.Attributes.PaymentMethod statement to verify.
</prosody>
</speak>
